column5: BMC_ISO_BUF_EN, enable ISOLATION buffer to sys CPLD after Thomaha power on. Active Low.
PWR_BTN_IN_N, debug power button in. Active low.
BMC_PWR_BTN_OUT_N, debug power button out, active low.
BMC_CPLD_RESET1, RESET TOMAHAWK
BMC_CPLD_RESET2, RESET USERVER(COME)
BMC_CPLD_RESET3, RESET TOMAHAWK, MICROSERVER AND EVERYTHING IN MAIN POWER DOMAIN.
BMC_CPLD_RESET4, RESET EVERYTHING INCLUDING BMC AND STANDBY POWER COMPONENTS, AND TOMAHAWK AND MAIN POWER DOMAIN COMPONENTS.
BMC_CPLD_POWER_INT
BMC_HEARTBEAT_N
BMC ready output to SYS CPLD
SMbus alert, BMC<->COMe
SMB_ALERT, from SYS CPLD
RGMII1
FAB#1 connector present input, active low
FAB#2 connector present input, active low
FAB#3 connector present input, active low
FAB#4 connector present input, active low
SCM present input, active low
Thermal sensor monitor, reserved.
INT from SYSCPLD
INT from SYSCPLD
SWITCH_EEPROM1_WRT, BCM5389 SPI EEPROM upgrade, acitve high.
BMC_MAIN_RESET_N, output, active low
HSC_ALERT1, power hotswap chip ADM1278 alert input, active low.
CPLD_JTAG_SEL, set low when CPLD upgrade
BMC_CPLD_TMS, used for CPLD JTAG upgrade
BMC_CPLD_TDI, used for CPLD JTAG upgrade
BMC_CPLD_TCK, used for CPLD JTAG upgrade
BMC_CPLD_TDO, used for CPLD JTAG upgrade
PM_SM_ALERT_N, POWR1014A SMbus alert input.
HS_FAULT_N, power hotswap chip ADM1278 fault input, active low.
HOTSWAP_PG_INV, power hotswap chip ADM1278 power good, acitve low.
DEBUG_UART_SEL_0, Debug UART sel output.
BMC_WDTRST1, watchdog reset output1
BMC_WDTRST2, watchdog reset output2
USB bus detect.
VCP_ID[1:0] = "00" in Galaxy-4.
